data.message: What a great project! It is about love!

replies.message: Hey there, Ann. We couldn't agree more. Here's to a brighter tomorrow! -Kate
In the end LOVE WINS!  Thank you Ann!

Face Book I love it is great but the problem is that you guys don't have any help when we have problems w/ iPhones or iPads is very frustrating no toll free number x helping customers you write down in Safari about the problem but nothing gets solved so it's to bad this is happening I sure wish customers will be able to talk to some one over the phone y help to correct problems that sometimes it happens other Thant that is a great way to. Keep us connected with family and friends thank you so much for so great service. Congratulations to every one that make this possible for the whole world.
